trans-unit.source: What is Azure Scheduler?
trans-unit.target: What is Azure Scheduler?

trans-unit.source: | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Azure Scheduler allows you to declaratively describe actions to run in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: Azure Scheduler allows you to declaratively describe actions to run in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: It then schedules and runs those actions automatically.
trans-unit.target: It then schedules and runs those actions automatically.

trans-unit.source: What is Azure Scheduler?
trans-unit.target: What is Azure Scheduler?

trans-unit.source: Azure Scheduler allows you to declaratively describe actions to run in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: Azure Scheduler allows you to declaratively describe actions to run in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: It then schedules and runs those actions automatically.
trans-unit.target: It then schedules and runs those actions automatically.

trans-unit.source: Scheduler does this by using [the Azure portal](scheduler-get-started-portal.md), code, [REST API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn528946), or Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: Scheduler does this by using [the Azure portal](scheduler-get-started-portal.md), code, [REST API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn528946), or Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: Scheduler creates, maintains, and invokes scheduled work.
trans-unit.target: Scheduler creates, maintains, and invokes scheduled work.

trans-unit.source: Scheduler does not host any workloads or run any code.
trans-unit.target: Scheduler does not host any workloads or run any code.

trans-unit.source: It only _invokes_ code hosted elsewhere—in Azure, on-premises, or with another provider.
trans-unit.target: It only _invokes_ code hosted elsewhere—in Azure, on-premises, or with another provider.

trans-unit.source: It invokes via HTTP, HTTPS, or a storage queue.
trans-unit.target: It invokes via HTTP, HTTPS, or a storage queue.

trans-unit.source: Scheduler schedules [jobs](scheduler-concepts-terms.md), keeps a history of job execution results that one can review, and deterministically and reliably schedules workloads to be run.
trans-unit.target: Scheduler schedules [jobs](scheduler-concepts-terms.md), keeps a history of job execution results that one can review, and deterministically and reliably schedules workloads to be run.

trans-unit.source: Azure WebJobs (part of the Web Apps feature in Azure App Service) and other Azure scheduling capabilities use Scheduler in the background.
trans-unit.target: Azure WebJobs (part of the Web Apps feature in Azure App Service) and other Azure scheduling capabilities use Scheduler in the background.

trans-unit.source: The [Scheduler REST API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn528946) helps manage the communication for these actions.
trans-unit.target: The [Scheduler REST API](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dn528946) helps manage the communication for these actions.

trans-unit.source: As such, Scheduler supports [complex schedules and advanced recurrence](scheduler-advanced-complexity.md) easily.
trans-unit.target: As such, Scheduler supports [complex schedules and advanced recurrence](scheduler-advanced-complexity.md) easily.

trans-unit.source: There are several scenarios that lend themselves to the usage of Scheduler.
trans-unit.target: There are several scenarios that lend themselves to the usage of Scheduler.

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: For example:

trans-unit.source: _Recurring application actions:_ Periodically gathering data from Twitter into a feed.
trans-unit.target: _Recurring application actions:_ Periodically gathering data from Twitter into a feed.

trans-unit.source: _Daily maintenance:_ Daily pruning of logs, performing backups, and other maintenance tasks.
trans-unit.target: _Daily maintenance:_ Daily pruning of logs, performing backups, and other maintenance tasks.

trans-unit.source: For example, an administrator may choose to back up the database at 1:00 A.M.
trans-unit.target: For example, an administrator may choose to back up the database at 1:00 A.M.

trans-unit.source: every day for the next nine months.
trans-unit.target: every day for the next nine months.

trans-unit.source: Scheduler allows you to create, update, delete, view, and manage jobs and [job collections](scheduler-concepts-terms.md) programmatically, by using scripts, and in the portal.
trans-unit.target: Scheduler allows you to create, update, delete, view, and manage jobs and [job collections](scheduler-concepts-terms.md) programmatically, by using scripts, and in the portal.
